choices: She wakes up in the morning
She is woken up at night
1112.content:
Today was Claire Dunphy's birthday. In her early 40's she was the mother of three teens, and wife to realtor Phil Dunphy, who was, more or less, an idiot. Claire was pretty excited for her party tonight at her father's house, as the entire family would be attending.

An hour or so before the party, Claire decided to get ready. She put on makeup and a dress that showed her figure off really well. Now that she thought of it, her body had looked really nice lately, and she did not want to lose her nice figure. Minutes later, the Dunphy's made their way to her party.

At the party, Claire was happy to see that her whole family could make it. This included Jay, Gloria, Manny, Cam, Mitch, and Lilly. Claire recieved gifts from the entire family, but her favorite was the one from Phil. It was a necklace with a ruby in the middle, and she absolutely adored it. Gloria thought that it was nice too, adding,"Oh my God, it's absolutely beautiful!" Soon after the family returned home.

At home Claire put on the necklace. "Honey, thank you so much for this, it's beautiful!" "No problem, babe. Hey, you know what? It's still your birthday, and I think I might have one more small present for you..." "Little? Come on, don't put yourself down like that..." "You know what I mean! So, are you up for it?" Claire responded,"Am I ever!"

About a half an hour later, Claire had fallen asleep, the locket resting on top of her flat belly.
1112.title: Magic

11121.content:
Claire woke up next morning in her bedroom. Phil had already left for a business trip, where he would be gone for a week. She went into the bathroom to get dressed, after she was naked from last night's events. The first thing she noticed is that her breasts were more sensitive, more than they had been in years. A violent surge of nausea ran over her, and she found herself at the toilet vomiting. "Ugh... too much wine last night, I guess...", she thought to herself.

She put on some jeans, a striped shirt, and the necklace, and then went into the kitchen to help the kids get ready for school. As usual, Haley and Alex were arguing, with Luke right in the middle of it. Claire decided to put a stop to their bickering. "Alex, Haley, stop it right now, or I will ground yo-" She was interrupted by her belly growling loudly. "What was that?!", Luke asked, bewildered. Claire remained silent, placing a hand on her belly, hoping that it would settle down. Claire then took the kids to school.

After dropping them off, Claire decided to get breakfast. She stopped at a fast food restaurant to quell her hunger. She ordered two orders of sausage, eggs, and pancakes. After eating, she noticed that her belly slightly curved out at the bottom, as if she had swallowed a baseball. She was at a stoplight, so she lifted up her shirt and felt the small bump. It was firm, but had some give to it. "Must be bloated.", she thought to herself. The light turned green, and she returned home.

At the house, she began to feel tired from the large breakfast, so she decided to take a nap. An hour later, she noticed that it was about 10:30, and she heard her phone ring. Gloria was calling, wondering if she wanted to go shopping at the mall with her. "Uh, I don't know, Gloria-". Just then, she caught a glimpse of her belly in the mirror, and saw that it had grown again, making her look three months pregnant. "Actually, on second thought, that sounds fun!" Gloria would pick her up in a few minutes, and she hung up. Lifting up her shirt, she rubbed her swollen belly. "Looks like I might need bigger clothes", she said to herself, the necklace still around her neck. Not wanting Gloria to become suspicious of her "bloated" belly, she put on a light jacket, which hid the bump well.

Gloria picked up Claire, and they were on their way. Minutes later, they arrived at the mall. Not wanting Gloria to see her belly, she put her hands in her jacket's pockets. The two made their way to the food court, as it was time for lunch. Gloria didn't eat much, not wanting to ruin her perfect figure. Claire, however, found her appetite expanding, mimicking her mysterious growing belly. "Wow, you're eating a lot, Claire, are you alright?" "Yep, uh, I'm perfect!" Soon after that, they went into a clothing department.

Claire went looking for clothes to accommodate her growing belly, while Gloria looked for clothes that would show off her body. The two quickly found what clothes they were looking for, and wanted to try them on. Gloria was making her way to the dressing rooms, with Claire already in a room. She noticed that her belly had gotten bigger, making her look four months pregnant. She took her shirt off, and was about to put on the larger shirt, when Gloria bust into the dressing room. "Oh Claire! I'm so sorry, I didn't see you in here!" Her eyes were brought down to Claire's swollen belly, alarming her. "What happened to your stomach!?", she said,"You look pregnant!" Claire placed her hands on her taut belly. "Well, I'm not pregnant, I know that. This started earlier this morning, I'm just bloated, that's all." Gloria felt Claire's belly. "It feels like a pregnant belly, but I guess you know best." After that, Claire tried on her other clothes, and made purchases. They decided that that was all that they should buy, and they started to head home.

Once they arrived at the Dunphy's, Gloria asked a question. "Claire, that necklace is so beautiful. I was wondering, could I borrow it." "Oh yeah, sure!" "Also, I'm no doctor, but I think that you should get that checked out.", she said, gesturing to Claire's belly. Claire said that she would think about it, and Gloria offered to take her to the doctor's whenever she needed it.

Inside, Claire wondered if she should see a doctor, rubbing her belly, which felt oddly good, as she did so.
11121.title: She wakes up in the morning

choices: She is awoken in the night.
She sleeps through the night peacefully.
111211.content:
After minutes of thought, Claire decided to schedule an appointment with her doctor. She wanted her appointment to be a check up, and it was scheduled for 5:00 that night. She called Gloria, who would pick her up and take her there. Claire went to pick up her kids from school. Once she picked them up, she told them that she would be away later. "Kids, Gloria and I are going out later, so you'll be alone for a few hours. That means no setting the house on fire, Luke." Soon after, they arrived home.

At 4:45, Gloria went to pick up Claire. When they were halfway to the doctor's, Claire desperately had to pee. "Can we stop at this gas station? My bladder has been acting up lately." They pulled over, where Claire went to the restroom, after relieving herself, she stood up, unzipped her jacket, and lifted up her shirt. Giving her swollen belly a poke, asking herself, "Why am I so bloated? Could I be pregnant? No, no, that's stupid." After that, she left the bathroom and got back into Gloria's car.

They arrived at the doctor's office right on time, and Claire was able to walk right into her appointment. The nurse lead her into the office. "Please step on the scale." Claire stepped on the scale, and found that she had already gained 10 pounds in two days, to her surprise. After taking more measurements, the nurse left, leaving Claire and her belly alone. Minutes later, the family doctor came in. "How are you doing, Claire?'' "F-f-fine," she stammered nervously. "Could you strip down to your underwear, please?" he said. She only took off her pants, not wanting him to see her swollen belly. He eyed her suspiciously. "Your shirt,too." "Oh, I thought you just meant my panties,", she lied. She unzipped her jacket and took off her shirt, revealing her larger midsection. "Oh my, you've gotten a bit bigger around the middle!", he said, patting her belly. "Yep..",Claire said unenthusiastically, slowly rubbing her belly. "Lie down on the table and let me get a look at you."

Claire walked over to the table, and took a few tries heaving herself on, her belly weighing her down. She spread out on the table, and the doctor walked up to her. He placed his hands on her belly and felt the tautness of it. The doctor grabbed his stethoscope and placed it on her quivering belly, hearing what was inside, food, or something else. After a few minutes of this, he allowed her to put her clothes back on. "Unfortunately, this late in the day we can't run any tests on you, but if you come back tomorrow we can certainly run an ultrasound or anything else that you may want done." On that note, Claire left the office with Gloria.

"What did the doctor say?", Gloria asked. "They didn't say what was wrong with my belly, but I have to go back tomorrow for an ultrasound." "An ultrasound, for what?" "Just in case I'm pregnant, but I have a feeling that it'll be a waste of time." "I'm starving, do you want something to eat?", Gloria said. "I thought you'd never ask."

The two decided to eat at a buffet. Claire ate a lot of food to keep her hunger at bay, and she noticed that Gloria ate more than usual. Claire's belly pushed out once more, making her look five months pregnant. After eating, the two left to go home. They arrived at Claire's house, and as she exited the car, she noticed that Gloria seemed a bit bloated, and she still has the necklace on. Once Claire got in the house, she felt really tired, so she headed to her room. In the bedroom, she undressed, looking at her body. She got into her pajamas, which were getting a bit to small for her middle, and went to bed, her swollen belly on her mind.
111211.title: Schedule an appointment.

1112111.content:
Later that night, Claire was awoken by an unfamiliar feeling in her belly. She saw that it was almost swaying with movement from within. "What-" She pulled up her shirt, which had already exposed some of her belly, and placed her hands on the dome, trying to feel for more movement. As soon as it had started, it had ceased, and Claire had found that whatever was in her belly was pressing on her bladder.

Claire attempted to walk normally to the bathroom, but she found that she had developed a bit of a waddle. Slowly but surely, she made her way to the bathroom. She relieved herself, and began to wash her hands. She was almost in awe at the sight of her belly, making her appear at least six months pregnant. "Oh, God...why is this happening to me?" Her belly growled with hunger loudly. "Well, it looks like I'm starting early today..."

Claire waddled into the kitchen, looking for something to eat. Reaching in the fridge, she grabbed a carton of ice cream and a jar of pickles. She quickly devoured the pickles in a matter of minutes. "Huh,"she said, patting her belly,"I haven't had that since I was-" Claire quickly diffused that thought, and decided to go back to bed, because it was a Saturday, and she didn't have to get the kids ready for school. As she got back into her bed, she felt an odd squirming sensation in her belly, but quickly drifted off to sleep.

She woke up at 10:00 a.m., surprised that she wasn't hungry. Gloria said that she would pick her up at 10:30, so she didn't have long to find out what was wrong with her belly. Her bowling ball-sized belly had grown yet again, giving her the appearance of a woman who was seven months along. Not wanting everyone to see her bare belly in public, she decided to get dressed. She put on a pair of sweatpants and a t-shirt that covered all but the bottom of her belly.

The movement in her belly had increased, and she rubbed the large sphere in an attempt to calm it down, but to no avail. "Please hurry, Gloria..." Almost on queue, Claire heard a car pull up in the driveway. "Finally!" Claire stood at the door patiently, waiting for Gloria to knock. She did, and Claire opened the door for her. Claire was in shock at what stood before her. "Oh my God! What happened?!" Gloria's belly had grown monstrously over the night, as it was almost as big as Claire's. "I don't know...it started late last night." Gloria did not own any maternity clothes, since she didn't plan on having any more kids after Manny thirteen years ago, so she was forced to wear her usual sexy attire, which was almost bursting at the seams. They stood with their bellies touching, until Claire felt a kick from her belly. Gloria felt it, and asked,"What was that?'' "I don't know, but we need to leave, now!"

The two swollen women made their way into the doctor's office with a few minutes to spare. They checked in and took a seat. Claire sat next to an elderly woman, who put her hands on Claire's belly, which had started to quiver with movement from within. "Sure is active, isn't it? Oh, is your friend pregnant as well? How far along are you?" A nurse suddenly walked in. "Claire Dunphy." Claire struggled to get up, but eventually got up with Gloria's help. The two followed the nurse into an examining room.

Inside, Claire and Gloria took a seat, waiting for the doctor. He entered the room. His eyes widened,"I see that you've also gotten bigger," he said, looking at Gloria. She nodded her head, her hands drawing themselves to her belly. The doctor also noticed that Claire's growth, and signaled her to get on the examination table. It took her a few tries, but she was able to get on the table. The doctor pulled up her shirt, and began to feel her belly. She could feel more kicking from her belly, which alarmed the doctor. "I think we need an ultrasound for you right now!" He called the nurse, who came in with the ultrasound machine. She turned it on and handed the wand to the doctor. The nurse squirted gel all over Claire's swollen, kicking belly. He put the wand on her belly, and moved it around, trying to find out what was inside...
1112111.title: She is awoken in the night.

choices: Get ice cream, go to Claire's house to talk more
Claire has to pick up her kids and Gloria comes along
11121111.content:
Claire groaned, feeling more movement inside her as the doctor ran the ultrasound wand over her bulging belly. She couldn't believe it: in her 40s, raising three teenagers, one of whom getting ready for college, and now she was going to have a fourth child to take care of. At least that's what she thought.

"From what I can tell right now, it looks like you're expecting twins," the doctor smiled, turning to Claire. "Congratulations."

Claire looked between the doctor, Gloria, and the ultrasound's display in shock. "Twins? I can barely raise my three kids now! You're telling me I'll need to raise two babies now too?"

The doctor moved the wand and stroked his chin. "Make that three babies." Claire's eyes bugged out more and more. Gloria heaved herself out of her chair to get a better look, or at least she tried.

"I'll get a print-out," Gloria said, waving her hand away and sitting back down, hand on her belly, as big as Claire's and forcing her clothing to the limits.

"Triplets," Claire repeated to herself, hand on her forehead.

"...make that quadruplets," the doctor said, concerned. "That's impossible. I definitely scanned this part already but...there's no doubt about it. You're pregnant with four fetuses."

"Sure you don't want to check any longer?" Claire scoffed. "Maybe you'll find a fifth."

The doctor shrugged and traced the wand up near Claire's ribs. "You've got good intuition. Quintuplets." He squinted and looked at the screen. "And it looks like they're...getting bigger. I can see their growth in real time."

Claire looked down at her belly and could see that, gradually, it was swelling outward and she felt the kicking increasing. "Okay, that's enough," she said, slowly turning on her hips to hop off the examination table. "I'd rather not stick around to find out anymore."

The doctor shrugged. "Well, it's your choice. Mrs. Pritchett, you're up next."

Gloria sighed and gritted her teeth, grunting very un-femininely in contrast to her appearance to get her big belly off of her seat. When she finally got up-right, there was a loud rip and the sides of her belly were now visible; the dark, smooth skin that Claire knew would get Phil excited if he saw it.

"Ay, what happened?" Gloria said, noticing Claire and the doctor with their eyes fixed on her. "Did I tear part of my clothes?" Gloria turned around to try and get a look, not able to see the exposed part of her belly, only managing to turn her growing belly around in circles, knocking over some of the displays on the doctor's table.

"Just...get up here, Mrs. Pritchett," the doctor said, reaching a hand out to Gloria, helping her onto the display table. And as Claire saw her belly grow at an even quicker rate than hers, it was clear she needed the help. She rolled up her tight dress, exposing her huge, taut belly. Claire was jealous of how Gloria didn't have a single stretch mark, before remembering that she also had a beautiful, smooth belly.

Like Claire, the doctor began scanning the interior of Gloria's womb, the results no less shocking. "W-well Mrs. Pritchett-"

"Please, call me Gloria," Gloria said. "The name 'Pritchett' makes me feel so old."

Thanks for that, Claire thought to herself as the doctor cleared his throat, looking back at the screen.

"W-well Gloria, it looks like you're carrying...seven fetuses right now."

"Dios mio," Gloria said softly, hand on her forehead. "You're sure?"

"Well, like with Mrs. Dunphy, I could check some more," the doctor said, moving his wand up toward the top of Gloria's belly, only having his hand swatted back.

"Ay, don't try and touch me there," Gloria said, holding her hands over her breasts. "Believe me, I know they've gotten bigger since...the belly."

Claire looked down at her own chest, which had managed to get up to about a C cup, while Gloria was now pushing a G cup at least, squished into the tiny, cleavage-revealing dress Gloria she already had on. Of course...Claire complained inside her head.

"A-alright," the doctor said, admittedly focused on Gloria's chest more than her belly. "Well, it looks like your fetuses are growing at an astounding rate. Even more than Mrs. Dunphy's."

Gloria muttered to herself in Spanish as she tried to make it off of the examining table, another rip revealing her belly permanently. "Here, take my jacket," Claire said, mostly just wanting Gloria to be covered up to draw less attention. "But seven kids...any idea how far along we are, doctor?"

He shook his head. "The rate at which they are growing, it's impossible to say. But in 24 hours, I'd say you're both going to look much, much...much bigger."

Claire sighed. And the way those extra babies popped up during the exam, she wouldn't be surprised if they were both carrying seven...or more.

"We should schedule more tests right away," the doctor said. "This sort of thing...there's no precedent or medical event that we know of. You'll both need to be supervised and-"

"Oh no, you're not holding me up in your labs," Gloria said. "Columbian pregnant women are very expressive and open. I will deal with whatever this is at home, with my family," she said, patting her belly underneath the jacket that was no longer fitting her as it did Claire. "C'mon Claire, let's go home."

Claire wasn't happy about the idea of being holed up in the hospital with a mysterious pregnancy either but wanted more information. She held her belly with one hand as Gloria roped her arm under Claire's. "So, what do we do now?" Claire said, exasperated.

"We eat a lot of ice cream and then we talk, woman to woman," Gloria said. "We've never gotten to do that much. I know I'm married to your father but I feel like a sister with you. The sister I never had."

"But...there's already a sister in your family," Claire said, confused.

"Claire! That's not nice to say about Mitchell. I thought you were more accepting," Gloria said, glaring at Claire.

"No, obviously I don't...I meant Sonia."

"Oh, right," Gloria said, her face turning up in disgust. "Well we were never too close. But you and I-" Gloria said, wrapping an arm around Claire's shoulder and bringing their bellies together. "-are going to be very close."
11121111.title: Continue

choices: Claire and Gloria pick up the kids, announce their pregnancies
111211111.content:
Claire looked down at her rounding belly again, placing a hand on the bare skin that her shirt revealed, as she felt multiple kicks. Five babies...how am I gonna do this? And how is Gloria gonna raise seven kids? she thought to herself. "You know--maybe we should schedule you two for another appointment tomorrow. It wouldn't hurt." said the doctor with a shrug. "O-okay. That sounds fine." Claire responded. They set up their appointment and waddled to Claire's car.

As soon as the two largely pregnant women heaved themselves into Claire's car, their bellies let out a collective grumble. "So, about that ice cream..." Claire chuckled, rubbing her belly in an attempt to stop her babies kicking. Gloria was in agreement on the suggestion, and Claire drove to the local ice cream parlor, slightly faster than usual.

At the ice cream parlor, Claire and Gloria both ordered ice cream cones, with multiple scoops and flavors, their pregnancy cravings getting the best of them. They grabbed a nearby booth, careful not to get their bellies stuck between the table, and devoured their ice cream in a matter of minutes. "Dios mio, I am stuffed like a pig." Gloria said, pressing a hand on her jacket-covered belly, which was pressing tightly against the fabric. Claire could tell that both of their bellies had gotten larger since the doctor's appointment. Claire appeared full term with a single baby, while Gloria looked well overdue, nearing full term with twins. They left the parlor and headed home, deciding to have some girl-to-girl talk.

Following a short trek, the pregnant ladies reached the Dunphy home. Waddling indoors, Claire plopped down on the couch, turning on the TV, while Gloria slowly made her way to the bathroom. "Oh, bebes." she could be heard saying. A few minutes later, Gloria exited the restroom. She had ditched Claire's jacket, and, to Claire's surprise, her tattered dress as well. Donning only her bra and panties, it was evident that pregnancy suited Gloria, as it accentuated her every curve. Her round belly was free of any stretch marks, which slightly annoyed Claire, because her own previous pregnancies had been riddled with them.

Gloria sat on the couch next to Claire, as the couch slightly creaked in response. Claire was watching a pregnancy documentary on one of those health channels, which had piqued both of their interests. The watching didn't last long, as they began to discuss their own pregnancies. "I'll tell you what, Gloria, I don't know how I'm gonna have five more kids, especially at my age!" Claire said, as they both felt her large belly, feeling the kicks and punches within. "Claire, don't worry. You're the strongest woman I know. I don't know anyone else who goes through as much as you do, and hasn't gone cuckoo at the end of the day." Gloria said with a smile. Claire glanced at the necklace hanging around Gloria's neck, and thought that it was a bit odd that their mysterious pregnancies had occurred at the same time that Claire recieved the necklace. Claire thought little of it, though, and decided to change the subject.

"Thanks, Gloria, really. That helps. Although, I am excited that I'll be an aunt to seven little ones soon!" she said, placing her hand on Gloria's round stomach. "I know...I just hope I won't burst!" Gloria said, running her hand down the middle of her belly, as multiple kicks greeted her. "Hey, if the Octomom didn't, I think you're safe!" Claire laughed, her belly shaking as she did so. The two chatted and swapped belly rubs for the next few hours, the time flying by.

Claire then checked her watch, and realized that it was time to pick up the kids from school.
111211111.title: Get ice cream, go to Claire's house to talk...

1112111111.content:
"Oh, Gloria! We need to go pick up the kids!" Claire said, struggling to get up from the couch. "Ay, let's go!" Gloria responded, heaving herself up and waddling towards the front door. "Hey, hey, hey! You can't go out like that, you're practically naked and huge! No offense..." Claire trailed off, realizing that she was also in a similar predicament.

"What do you want me to do? It's not like I have any clothes that fit anymore!" Gloria said, emphatically placing a hand on her swollen belly. "I think I might have some old maternity clothes stowed away in my closet, we should check there." Claire replied.

After a brief search, Claire found some old maternity blouses and jeans, which would fit for the time being. For her at least, the same couldn't be said for Gloria. Claire's was able to cover her growing bump fully (although it strained a bit), but Gloria's blouse left a sliver of her belly to be displayed. Without further ado, the two largely pregnant woman waddled to Claire's van, as they prepared themselves to announce that their kids would get more brothers and sisters.

A short drive later, Claire and Gloria pulled up to the school, waiting for the bell to ring. "Are you ready to do this?" Claire asked, nervously placing a hand on her enlarged stomach. "Not really, but the truth has to get out sometime." Gloria replied. "God, how are we gonna tell everyone else? I mean, Cam and Mitch might take it alright, but Jay? He'll have a heart attack! And who knows how Phil's gonna take it when he comes home..." Claire said. "We'll throw a get-together! Let's have it at your house, and we can announce it together! I'll come over before Jay gets home so he won't know about it." Gloria said, feeling her babies kick and squirm inside her belly. "I...guess that sounds alright." Claire responded.

Suddenly, kids flooded from the school, and Alex, Luke, and Manny made their way to the van. They climbed in and took their seats. Claire breathed heavily, preparing herself to make the announcement. "Hey, kids. How was school?" she asked, planting on a fake smile. "Good." they replied in unison, the typical response. "Wait, where's Haley?" Claire asked, slightly concerned. "She got a ride from Dylan. He's going on vacation for a few months and wanted to say goodbye." Alex replied.

"Right. Okay. Well, I think there's something that Gloria and I would like to announce something. We...are...pregnant. Both of us..." Claire trailed off, fearing their response. "Okay." Luke replied. "Congratulations, ladies! Just to let you know, you both have my full support, and I will help you out whenever you need me." Manny said. "Wait, what?!? Mom, you're pregnant?!? At your age? Having a baby after forty isn't exactly easy!" Alex replied, exasperated.

"Well, that's the other thing. We aren't just having one baby. I'm pregnant with quintuplets..." Claire said. "And I'm having seven babies." Gloria responded, rubbing the bare sliver of belly for emphasis. Alex's head nearly exploded with shock, and she sat in silence for the rest of the ride. After dropping Gloria and Manny back at their house, the growing Dunphy family returned back to their own home.

While Luke and Alex went to their rooms to do their homework, Claire returned to the couch, indulging on her cravings in the process. This time, she didn't have a specific craving, but she craved something, anything that she could eat: chips, cookies, you name it. Ending her feeding frenzy minutes later, she noticed that her belly had once again gotten bigger, making her look well overdue. She rolled up her maternity blouse, and rubbed her bared belly, trying to get where her babies were kicking. "Jeez, I wonder how big Gloria must be!" she chuckled, her belly vibrating along to each laugh.

Suddenly, Haley walked in the house, her hair slightly disheveled. Claire slowly rose from the couch, although she intended to do it much faster, and turned towards Haley, forgetting that her large belly was bared to her. "OH MY GOD, MOM?!?" she asked, clearly taken aback by her mother's newfound girth. "Haley...sweetie...I'm...pregnant. With five babies." she said, puckering her lips as she awaited her daughter's response. "Mom, that's disgusting! Do you know how old you are?" Haley asked. "Yes, Haley, yes I do. But you know what, this wasn't exactly planned, and it's not exactly a normal--"

"You don't understand! My friends aren't gonna want to hang out with me! They don't want to hang out with someone who's mom is a big, fat cow!" she yelled, poking Claire's protruding belly with force, as if she were attempting to pop it. She stormed upstairs, leaving Claire to think about how quickly her life would change.
1112111111.title: Big Announcements

choices: Day 3 of Claire and Gloria's mysterious pregnancy
11121111111.content:
"Well, that could have gone better..."Claire sighed, rolling down her blouse. Realizing that she only had about half an hour before the get-together was supposed to start, Claire decided that she should clean up the living room. She removed the empty bags of chips and other food packages from the couch, and disposed of them in the trash can. This took a little longer than she thought, and she was a bit surprised when the doorbell rang.

Claire opened the door, and found that Gloria and Manny were standing behind it. To Claire's surprise (although at this point, it really shouldn't be), Gloria was bigger, nearing the triplets mark. Manny went upstairs to Luke's room, where he would correct his homework."Hola, Claire. Jay and everyone else should be here soon." Gloria said. "Alright, guess the only thing we can do is wait." Claire said.

Although she had announced her pregnancy twice before, she was most nervous about this announcement, particularly how her father would react. Not only would he learn that he would have to raise seven more kids, but he would also have five new grandchildren to take care of. Before Claire could finish her thought, the doorbell rang once more.

"Come in!" she said. The two pregnant women stood in the living room, waiting for Jay, Cam, and Mitchell to see them. "Sorry we're a bit late, we were just able to find a babysitter for Lily." Cam said. They entered the living room, and their collective jaws dropped. "Claire, Gloria, are you..." Mitchell trailed. "Pregnant? Yup. And we're not only having just one baby. I'm having quintuplets, and Gloria here is having septuplets." Claire said, placing one hand on her own belly and the other on Gloria's.

Jay was silent. He took a seat, and placed his head in his hands. "Fu...."he trailed off. "I'm sorry, but twelve babies between the both of you? How did that even happen? It's not like multiples run in the family or anything." Mitchell said. "I'm just as surprised as you are, Mitchell. Believe me." Claire said. "Well, the important thing is that you're both having a healthy pregnancy and you're both happy. You are happy, right?" Cam asked, trying to lighten the mood. "For now, I guess. But as I get bigger, I doubt I'll be in as good spirit." she replied.

Claire wondered where Gloria was, as she hadn't spoken in a while. She was a bit surprised to see that she was stuffing her face with whatever food was in the fridge. Jay just looked on, shaking his head. As the party progressed, the kids made their way downstairs. Haley had taken a seat next to Gloria, and the two rubbed her humongous stomach. Haley treated Gloria's pregnancy better then her mother's mainly because she was a little afraid of becoming a big sister again.

"You know, Gloria. That's a beautiful necklace. Would you mind if I borrowed it for a few days?" Haley asked, hypnotized by the jewelry that dangled around Gloria's neck. "Oh, sure! It's your mother's, but I'm sure she won't mind." Gloria said, removing the necklace and handing it to Haley, before quickly returning her hands to her belly. As Haley donned the necklace, a reddish hue emitted from it, unseen by both of the ladies.

An hour or so later, the guests left, and Claire decided that it was time to go to bed. Walking upstairs, she noticed that Haley was in the kitchen eating, and quite ravenously at that. "Hey Haley, you didn't eat earlier?" she asked. "No, I did. I'm still hungry." her daughter replied. "Alright, well just make sure you turn off all the lights when you go to bed, alright?" Claire asked. "Okay." Haley said, between loud munches.

Claire slowly made her way to her bedroom and removed her clothing, only donning her bra and panties. She lay down in her bed, and slowly drifted off to sleep, her babies lightly kicking inside her swollen stomach.
11121111111.title: Another announcement!  Another pregnancy!

111211111111.content:
Claire awoke groggily from her slumber, feeling her babies kick, slightly stronger than they were yesterday. She rose from her bed, or at least attempted to. Her increased girth had continued to hinder her movement, and it took multiple heaves to get herself up. She waddled to the bathroom, as one of the babies had unleashed a particularly strong kick on her bladder.

After relieving herself, Claire looked at her pregnant form in the mirror. Once again, her belly had grown, looking eight months pregnant with twins, if not full term. Her breasts had also slightly grown, but with three previous pregnancies, there wasn't much more room for them to grow. "If I'm like this now...how much time do I have left?" she asked herself, rubbing her belly.

Claire put on some maternity clothes, and noticed that her belly peeked out from the gaps between her shirt and jeans. "Guess I'll need some bigger clothes," she noted. As her round stomach let out a rumble and a flurry of kicks surfaced, Claire headed downstairs to make breakfast, realizing that Luke, Alex, and Haley were still asleep.

Meanwhile at the Pritchett house, Gloria was just waking up. She rolled over, her belly carrying a load of momentum, and saw that Jay was nowhere to be found. She had almost forgot that he said that he would be going golfing. Which would eventually lead to drinking with his friends, but that was besides the point.

She threw off the bed sheets, and was left in awe at the sight of her belly. It had continued to balloon outward, giving her the appearance of a woman who was full term with quadruplets. Her globular stomach let out a loud rumble, signalling that her babies were hungry. She tried to get up, grunting as she did so, but it was no use. Her seven babies kicked wildly, surprised at their mother's sudden "exercise". "MANNY!" Gloria yelled at the top of her lungs.

"Yes, mom?" Manny replied, reaching her bedroom in seconds flat. "Manny, dear. Could you please cook me some breakfast?" she asked kindly, rubbing her belly for emphasis. Manny stood in place, alarmed at his mother's growing belly, but snapped out of it and ran to the kitchen. Gloria sat in bed, rubbing her belly, as she waited for Manny to cook her breakfast.

A few minutes later, Manny returned with a heap of food on a tray. He handed it to Gloria, and she used her belly as a shelf, as she began to dig in, not even thanking her son. A few minutes later, she had licked her plate clean, and let out a small burp for emphasis. "Thank you, Manny. It was delicious!" she said, handing the tray to him.

Gloria began to scratch her belly, which slightly alarmed Manny. "Mom? Is everything okay?" he asked. "Yes, it just itches." she replied. "Here, grab that bottle on my dresser." she continued. Manny grabbed the lotion, and returned to his pregnant mother's side. "Now, get a handful of it and spread it around my belly." Gloria said. "Uh...really?" he asked. "Manny, you said that you would do anything that I needed, right?" she answered back, prying for sympathy. "Alright..." Manny sighed.

He began to rub the lotion on Gloria's rotund stomach, and covered most of her belly a short while later, as he could feel the kicks from the occupants within. Gloria then recieved a call. "Hey, Gloria! It's me, Claire. Do you want to go to the mall to get some bigger clothes? We can do it before the appointment." Claire said. "Sure that sounds fine." Gloria replied. "Okay, then. I'll be right over." Claire said, ending the call.
111211111111.title: Day 3 of Claire and Gloria's mysterious pregnancy

1112111111111.content:
Claire arrived at Gloria's house minutes later. She waddled inside, and saw that the house seemed empty. "Hello? Gloria?" she called out. "She's upstairs." Manny replied coming out of the kitchen. "Right, thank you, Manny." Gloria said, as she slowly made her way up the stairs. Upon entering the bedroom, she could see that Gloria was lying in her bed, and her humongous belly was blocking her face. "Claire, is that you? I can't see anything!" she declared. "Yes, it's me. I'm gonna help you up, alright?" Claire responded.

Claire pulled Gloria up with all her might, although she was much, much heavier than she expected. With effort, she was able to get Gloria upright. "Alright, Gloria, let's get you dressed." Claire said. "But I have nothing that fits!" Gloria answered. "Okay, so just put on what I gave you yesterday." Claire replied. Gloria grabbed the maternity clothes, and was able to get the jeans on fine. Her blouse, however, only went down to her popped-out belly button, the bottom half of her belly exposed. "Good enough." Gloria noted, rubbing her belly as her babies kicked inside.

Waddling down the stairs was a little easier than getting up them, and they reached Claire's car a few minutes later. When they arrived at the mall, they waddled to the maternity store. They bought the biggest clothes that would fit, though they knew that it wouldn't be enough when they reached full term. Even then, the blouses were a decent fit for Claire, but Gloria's bare belly was revealed in her purchases.

They made their way down the mall, when they reached the food court. Their bellies let out a collective, deep rumble, and their occupants kicked up a storm. Without a single word, they bolted (more of a quick waddle, really) to different restaurants, filling plate upon plate with food. Squeezing themselves in at a table, they devoured their meals within a few minutes.

Once again, their bellies had grown. Claire looked pregnant with triplets, while Gloria looked pregnant with quintuplets. Claire looked at her watch. "You know what, Gloria? We have some time to spare, do you wanna go back to my place to try some of these clothes on?" she asked. "Fine by me." Gloria groaned, rubbing her bare belly. Claire was able to get up, but Gloria's belly got stuck between the rest of her body and the table. After a few moments of shimmying, Claire was able to pull Gloria out.

Returning to the Dunphy household, Claire and Gloria entered carrying multiple bags of clothing. "So we don't have too much time to try these on so--" "AAAAAAAAAGGGGGGHHHH!" The two pregnant women froze as they heard a bloodcurdling scream from upstairs. They made their way up the stairs, as fast as their bellies could carry them. Hearing another scream, they could tell that it was coming from Haley's room. Claire opened the door, and was shocked at what she saw.

Haley looked pregnant, and largely so. In fact, she was about Claire's size, but her belly appeared to be growing slightly before their eyes. She hadn't bothered to change clothes from last night, and her skinny jeans had burst open, her t-shirt baring her belly completely. "Haley what happened?!?" Claire asked, exasperated. "I DON'T KNOW! I JUST WOKE UP!" Haley replied, obviously not calm. Claire decided that they needed to get to the doctor's office, and fast. Helping Haley out of bed and down the stairs, Claire and Gloria made it to Claire's car. As soon as everyone was in, Claire sped off. "Great, just great." Alex said, realizing that she was left alone with Luke.

Arriving at the doctor's office, the three pregnant ladies waddled inside, though Haley was lagging behind as she was getting used to her size. Claire approached the desk and let the secretary know that they had arrived. A few minutes later, they were called into one of the examining rooms, where the doctor was waiting.

"Oh my, your daughter, too?" he asked, perplexed. "Unfortunately, yes." Claire replied. "Well, we only have two ultrasound machines at the moment, so we can do two of you at a time." the doctor said. "That sounds fine. I guess Gloria and I will go first." Claire answered. The two heaved themselves onto the examining tables, and the doctor rubbed the gel on both of their bulging bellies. The doctor moved the wands all over their stomachs, trying to get a full image of their baby-filled wombs.

"Okay, so it appears that there are no more babies that have appeared since yesterday's examination, and the growth is slower, at least when compared to the last exam." the doctor noted. "How far along are we, médico?" Gloria asked, wincing as she felt a particularly strong kick. "Six, maybe seven months." he replied. Claire gasped. "So that means we will give birth--" "Tomorrow..." Gloria finished. "It appears that way..." the doctor concluded. He wiped the gel off of their bellies with a towel, and helped them get off of the table.

It took a collective effort to get Haley onto one of tables. After the hard effort, the doctor began to examine Haley. "Oh, my..." he said, briefly examining her womb. "What?" all three pregnant women asked. "I...don't know how to say this but...you're Octomom. You're going to have eight babies." the doctor concluded.

"I'm...the fat cow..." Haley trailed, tears filling her eyes. "Oh my god..." Claire added. "I have no answer for you two. In all my years, I've never seen something like this..." he added. Claire looked at her daughter as the doctor mentioned that Haley was four months along, but the pregnancy was quickly progressing. She looked at her slowly growing belly, her enlarged breasts, and the necklace hanging around her neck. Wait a minute...

"It's the necklace!" Claire exclaimed. "Excuse me?" the doctor asked, annoyed that he had been interrupted. "The necklace that Phil gave me for my birthday! I gave it to Gloria, who gave it to Haley...It made us pregnant!" she concluded. "Mrs. Dunphy, that's highly unnatural..." he replied in a condescending tone.

"No, I think she's telling the truth. What else could be the cause?" Gloria asked. Haley didn't say anything, as she was still in shock, but she realized that somehow it had to be true. "I...okay. Whatever you say..." the doctor said, as he left the room. "What are we going to do now?" Gloria asked.

"I am going to call Phil, and then we're going to track down whoever did this to us."
1112111111111.title: Bigger Clothes, Bigger Bellies

11123.content:
How about the same storyline, but just a little different.

I mean, a cursed necklace is a common storyline with this genre.
11123.title: New Storyline/Other

choices: Claire wakes up in the morning
111231.content:
It’s December in the Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker Households, and they are all preparing for christmas. Gloria is pregnant with Joe and will give birth next month, Jay is at his brother Donnie’s for the weekend and will return on christmas day, Cameron and Mitchell are staying at Cameron’s parents farm for the weekend with Lilly, Phil has been away since Thanksgiving at a business conference and will return with Jay on christmas. So this leaves only Manny, Claire, Haley, Alex, Luke, and Gloria in the city.

It’s two weeks from christmas. Everyone at Jay and Gloria’s house for a pre christmas party. There will be gifts, food, and music. The first there is obviously the beautiful latina wife Gloria, her beautiful details made more detailed due to be eight months pregnant. Gloria’s son Manny, who is wise beyond his years, is the main caterer of the party, with help from Mitchell and Cam with facetime on the computer. Claire, Jay’s daughter from his first marriage, may be a near, or at middle aged soccer mom who is still pretty.

Then entering is Haley, Claire and Phil’s beautiful daughter who dresses like the average american girl and lives for social media. Then enters is Alex, who is pretty, but more of a girl next door pretty, and is very smart. And then entering is the youngest kid of the Dunphy family, Luke, who is always face first in a DS.

The women are dressed in beautiful dresses with glamorous makeup, except for Alex, who is wearing her regular clothes. Manny and Luke are in formal pants and collared shirts. The rest of the family are on facetime with the mac books and iPhones. Gifts were handed around, from those at the party and outside the state. But the best is one item.

It was a necklace, beautifully ornate with a glass blown glass crystal made up of the seven colors: ROYGBIV. But around it are a series of small gems, probably diamonds. It was a gift from Phil to Claire, with everyone adding in their words of affection for it. After that, the Dunphy's returned back to their home, with Claire wearing the necklace the whole way home.


After returning home with everyone falling asleep, the diamonds on the necklace start to glow. The die is cast, the game has started, and the next 10 days will be a marvel in modern society.
111231.title: The accursed necklace of Bastet

1112311.content:
Claire-Day 1

Since the necklaces then secret effects started to take effect at 10 PM, the moment Clair fell asleep, she slept for eight hours, waking up at 6 AM. Since her kids didn’t have school, they woke up later at 10 AM. And she had already made breakfast. Clair had made toast, eggs, bacon, pancakes, and scrambled eggs. While Claire ate slightly more than usual, nothing else was out of the ordinary.

And by ordinary, I mean Haley and Alex arguing over the most pointless thing while Luke plays on one of his DS games. After everyone had breakfast and were dressed for the day, Claire dropped Luke off at Jay’s house to hang out with Manny, and dropped Haley and Alex at the mall to hang out with friends. After dropping them off, Claire then went to a place serving lunch and had some lunch. She ate what some would consider enough for two people, even doing some peculiar things with her food, such as mixing and matching to experiment with her lunch.

And what freaked her out was that each one of her absent minded tests tasted good. After that, she returned home and just hung out. Then when the clock suddenly hit 4 PM, she suddenly got badly nauseas and ran to the bathroom and emptied out her lunch. After washing out her mouth she went to the couch to watch TV, then was suddenly hit with the need to go to the bathroom. Then once she finished, she went to the couch and fell asleep.

What she didn’t know was that this would repeat for her for days. At about 8 PM, she went back into her car and picked up Haley, Alex, and Luke. When she prepared to go to bed that night at 9 PM, she started to notice a tightness in her bra when she took it off and got into her pajamas. As she was about to get into bed, she noticed that she looked a little puffy, so she went to the scale and found that she gained at least 5 pounds. She ignores this and goes to bed, still wearing the necklace.

The first day ends, and as nine more days come up, more will join this woman as she continues to wear the necklace.
1112311.title: Claire wakes up in the morning

11123112.content:
Claire-Day 2

In a sleepwalking daze at midnight, Claire wonders around the house for hours, emptying the fridge of food. By an estimate, she has stuffed herself with enough food to gain 15 pounds when she wakes up. Yet while she's in the kitchen, her necklace somehow got removed from her neck and is now somewhere in the house. When she wakes up, she makes breakfast for the kids, while asking aloud, "Where's all the food in the fridge?" However, she makes breakfast for the kids anyway and drops them off at the mall and Manny's, just like yesterday. However, what's different is that one of Claire's daughters found the necklace and put it on.

The question is, which daughter got the necklace?
11123112.title: That night

111231121.content:
Haley went about doing whatever a sociable teenager/young adult does when out of the house. She and Clair are oblivious to what the necklace has done to her or her mother. She returns home with her sister and brother and they find Clair sucking down a carton of ice cream. Luke chuckles, "Cool..." And they head to their bedrooms to relax. When Haley was preparing for bed, she felt like her breasts had gotten bigger.

Claire-Day 3
Haley-Day 1

Tomorrow Haley will give the necklace away...But who?
111231121.title: Haley

1112311211.content:
Claire-Day 4
Haley-Day 2
Gloria-Month 8/Day 1

When Haley woke up, she rushed towards the bathroom and began throwing up. In between upchucks, she could hear someone else throwing up as well. When she finished and got out of the bathroom, her mother looked as disheveled as her, only very, very puffy in the stomach. Clair raised a hand, “Ya know...If I hadn’t thrown up as well, I’d think you went out to a party last night.” Haley shrugs, “I believe you.” The morning continued, Claire making breakfast, although this time enough for two dozen people, Haley and Alex arguing with each other, and Luke ignoring them to play his DS games. That day, Claire dropped the kids off at Jay’s house so that they can hang out with Alex and Manny can go to a museum to hang out with some friends, Luke is dropped off at a game shop, and Haley will go to the mall to hang out with some friends. Haley chose to be dropped off by her mom so that she could borrow some of Gloria’s high heels to check out a dress on sale that day. Claire wore very baggy clothes and a hoodie to hide her stomach, but it only hid so much. When Manny opened the door for the ladies to enter his parent’s house, Claire would put her hands into the jacket pocket. Gloria hugs her husband's daughter and her kids and gets Haley the high heels she needs. When she returned she tells her, “What a beautiful necklace, Haley.” Haley holds it up and asks, “Thanks. I actually don’t know why I put it on, really. It won’t go with the dress I’m trying on. Would you like to borrow it?” Gloria answers, “Absolutely!” She doesn’t waste time putting it on. Haley and Claire head out, but Gloria joins them. She asks, “Claire? Can you drop me off at the gynecologists?” Claire shrugs, “Sure.” Haley’s dropped off at the mall and Claire goes to the doctors with Gloria. While Gloria is checked on, Claire rushes out to throw up. When she returned, the doctor, a woman, asks, “Are you alright?” Claire answers, “Sure. Sure. Sure.” She sounded unsure of herself. The doctor asks, “I wouldn’t ask this otherwise, but since I’m in this appointment...Is it possible that you are pregnant?” Claire turns chalk white at this realization. She stuttered out a lot of sounds, suddenly making the realization. But the only audible part is, “But I started feeling funny only a few days ago…” The doctor motions for her to lay on the table. The doctor moved about some machines and stated, “From the size, I’d say that your around several months pregnant, probably big enough to see the baby…” She puts the applicant and gell onto her belly and saw something unique. She blurts out, “Wow! There’s…”
1112311211.title: Gloria

11123112111.content:
The doctor told her, “I count at least 3 fetuses, but at most 5 fetuses.” Claire turned white as a ghost. She screamed “THREE TO FIVE!?” The doctor stuttered, “I-it might be less...Although, that’s not what worries me.” Gloria asks, “What worries you?” The doctor grabbed a towel and rubbed it on her forehead, “W-well...It’s the rate of growth. If you look here,” She points to a spot on the ultrasound, “Now watch,” And suddenly, it and the other blobs grow bigger, just as Claire’s stomach gets bigger, “That isn’t possibly in a matter of seconds. That kind of growth happens in days, weeks even. If I were to be honest, I think you should come back tomorrow with anyone else that has shown symptoms as well.” She heads for the door, but turns around, “Now, I’m gonna go home and have a serious stroke.” Gloria asks a nurse, “Was she serious?” The nurse shrugs. The two mothers set up an appointment for tomorrow and head home.

Which Home?
11123112111.title: About 4

111231121112.content:
Gloria and Claire head over to Gloria’s house to figure this out. First, they make calls for the kids to be dropped off at the house to tell them the big news. While waiting, they ate an assortment of strange foods due to the cravings. There was indian food mixed with pizza, ice cream mixed with burgers, and so much more. After eating, they sat in the living room and chatted for hours. The kids didn’t arrive until late in the evening. The first to arrive was Alex and Manny, then Haley, and finally Luke. When Alex and Manny entered, Gloria got a thick blanket to cover Claire to surprise the kids. Alex enters, blurting out, “Why do the perfect in mind and body seem oblivious?” Gloria asks, “What’s wrong?” She tells him, “I met this boy at the museum. His name's Benny and he moved here from Hong Kong. He’s nice, smart, and cute. But all I did was stutter like I was in 3rd grade!” Gloria rubs her head, “Maybe you need to try something different?” Alex asks, “What, like makeup?” Gloria shrugs, “Maybe some jewelry will help. Why don’t you try on this necklace? It’s your sisters, so you can give it back to her.” She puts the necklace Claire got at the start of all this around Alex’s neck. When Luke finally arrives, Claire starts off, “Guys, I have a surprise…” Haley finishes, “I’m getting a new car?” “No.” Luke finishes, “I’m getting a new video game?” “No.” Alex finishes, “Am I getting a confidence boost?” “What? No. The surprise is…” Gloria finishes, removing the blanket, “We’re getting some new additions!” Manny goes to Claire and tells her, “Congratulations, Claire. I believe that a speech is in order-” Claire finishes, “No speeches, please.” Alex blurts out, “You do realize delivery will be difficult with the fact that you haven’t given birth in a few years?” Claire asks Gloria, “Was I just called old?” Haley weeps, “I’m not getting a car!!!” And rushes over to the kitchen. Luke asks, “You said ‘some,’ how many are there?” Claire shrugs, “Three...Maybe five…” Everyone’s eyes bug out. Alex asks, “Does dad know?” Claire answers, “That’s one I’ve been trying to figure out.” Claire and her kids return home, along the drive, Claire notices Alex’s new necklace. She asks, “Alex, where’d you get the necklace?” Alex answers, “Gloria says it’s Haleys. She let me borrow it to impress Benny.” Claire asks, “Haley, where’d you get that necklace?” She tells her, “I found it in the kitchen at the house.” Claire tells her, “I’m sorry to say this but that’s my necklace.” The subject is drawn on as much as it could and eventually dies down. The kids return home and forget about the necklace. When they get home, Claire calls a restaurant with delivery to deliver half a dozen pizzas of different flavors, all the flavor of 10 piece hot wings, and a large helping of fries. When the food arrives, Claire quickly starts on it, and strangely Haley joins her in the food. Afterwards, the Pritchett and Dunphy family fell to sleep, with the three oldest women randomly getting up to go to the bathroom or eat something.

Claire-Day 5
Haley-Day 3
Gloria-Month 8/Day 2
Alex-Day 1

Alex goes out to a planetarium to meet with Benny, Luke and Manny go to a friends house to film a zombie movie, and Haley heads to a friends house. With the day to themselves before the doctors visit, Gloria takes Claire out to buy maternity clothes that will fit her. Afterwards, the two made their way to the food court, where they got one of everything and finished it all in less than an hour. The two then head out to the doctor's office and check in with the same doctor as before. The ultrasound was quickly put to use. The doctor blurts out, “Amazing! They’ve grown almost a whole month since yesterday!” Gloria mumbles, “Dios Mio!” She adds, “But what’s confusing, other than that, is that they’re in the best condition I’ve ever seen in multiples...But, I can now definitively say that there’s...

111231121112121.title: 4 kids

1112311211121211.content: Haley was the first to wake up. She was woken up at 5:30 AM by the sound of pebbles being thrown at her window. She struggles to get up, due to a strange weight on her stomach. She gets, oblivious to the orb that is her stomach due to having fallen asleep in a women’s Poncho that she wore the day before. She was too lazy to change into pajamas. She looks out her window to see her idiot boyfriend Dylan. Lucky for her he’s very sweet. He whispers somewhat loudly, “Haley, I have a surprise!” She asks, “What is it?” He tells her, “An all day date...Wherever you want to go…” Haley’s stomach grumbles, “Can we get breakfast?” Dylan shrugs, “Sure.” They spend the whole day going about to feed whatever craving Haley was having. Claire wakes up next, and gets a facetime with Phil at 3 o’clock. He waves, “Good morning, honey, how'd your week been like?” Claire answers, “Well...I’m pregnant with quadruplets.” He squeals, “Wow, that’s coconuts!” He then has a different look about him, like he’s remembered something, “Huh...That nice lady was right.” Claire starts to look agitated, “What lady?” Phil explains, “The lady that owned the antique shop I bought your pre christmas necklace from told me that I’d soon have an army of kids for having the necklace of Bastet.” Claire remembers history class, “You mean Bastet, the egyptian cat goddess?” Phil nods, “Yeah.” Claire looks up Bastet, and continues with an ever increasingly high voice, “The one worshipped as a symbol of family, and love, and sometimes fertility?” Phil answers, “I dunno. Why? Do you not like the necklace.” Claire answers, “No no, I love the necklace. It’s just that I’ve gotta go out to see Gloria...And Haley...And Alex…” She turned off facetime and went to Haley’s room to find a note that read, ‘Went to breakfast with Dylan, will be back soon.’ Claire was worried for Haley, but figured, she’d pick her up soon. She hears a ring to her doorbell and Alex opens the door to see Manny and a boy of asian descent with long bangs slightly swept to the side and dressed in a v neck sweater with a button up collared shirt underneath, with thick framed glasses slid into the collar. Alex looks at Manny first, “Hi, Manny…” Then she sees the other boy and stutters, “Oh, uh, h-hi Benny…” He waves, “Hi, Alex. You ready to head out?” Claire asks, “Head out where?” Manny explains, “We’re going to Andrew’s birthday party. We’ll be back in a few hours.” Claire shrugs, “Okay. I have a doctor’s appointment, so you can drop off Alex there when you’re done. And can you get Haley to come if you see her as well.” They see Claire’s now larger stomach and don’t think anything of it and head out. Claire is picked up by a now larger Gloria and they head to the doctors. During the appointment...
1112311211121211.title: Tomorrow's a crazy day.

11123112111212111.content:
After a while, Haley and Alex finally arrive. Although, if Claire’s theory is correct, they shouldn’t of brought Dylan, Manny, and Benny with them. After Claire covertly shoos Dylan and Benny out, she asks, “Excuse me, Doctor, but would you be willing to check on my daughters for me?” The doctor shrugs, “Sure.” The doctor does an originally unassuming procedure for the girls, and stutters, “Oh my...Th-they’re both pregnant...A-and it’s 3-5, just like with you, Mrs. Dunphy.” Haley and Alex are beyond shocked. The looks on their faces is indescribable. Alex finally blurts out, “I swear I haven’t done it yet.” Claire assures her, “Don’t worry, Alex, I believe you. And Haley...I believe you’ve used protection before.” She breaks down in a waterfall of tears, “I did every time!!!” Gloria asks, “So what’s happening?” Claire answers, “I think I know. Did anyone notice anything strange since the party we had almost a week ago?” Everyone that was there starts thinking. Alex speaks up, “Yeah...It was when you suddenly started showing symptoms.” Claire finishes, “That’s correct...Now here’s where it gets weird...I think that all of this is possibly, maybe, perhaps, very likely that all of this was caused by that nice necklace Phil got me...Which almost every woman in this family has worn since the party...Which he said he got from a woman told him that Bastet would bless his family.” One of the nurses asks, “Bastet? The Egyptian Goddess?” Everyone stares at her, “What? I took a semester in mythologies.” After half an hour, everyone returns home. Along the way, Dylan and Benny nervously console Haley and Alex until they’re returned home.

Claire-Day 7
Haley-Day 5
Gloria-Month 8/Day 4
Alex-Day 3

112.content:
Here's two ideas for a story:

1) Gloria's sister, Sonia, disgruntled over missing out of not getting out of Colombia and being married (Despite the man having kids as old as her), she summons a male Succubus, an Incubus, with a voodoo woman she meets. However, the "Demon" is a rather average man with rabbit ears (Because rabbits are actually very horny), and only she can see it. So the "demon" named Jackie has to possess people to...Get it on.

2) Manny goes to an antique store and buys things for his mom and Jay's family, without realizing there's magic.

112.title: Gloria

1121.content: The city is beautiful. It’s always beautiful everytime Sonia gets on the flight to get her out of Columbia. But this visit to the city is permanent now that she’s got a card that says she can stay. Truthfully she would have stayed longer if not for her sister Gloria. First, the bruja has the gall to live in America using something that’s her right. Then she marries Jay, a man who admits when he met them he wanted to date her first. Sonia didn’t care that he was old enough to have kids her age, older even, at least she’d be married to a successful man! And to top it off, they have a son together they have Fulgencio Joseph and it burns a bridge with her sister when she finds out that Sonia tried to kiss Jay. Oddly, Gloria and Jay were at the airport to welcome her to america with Joe in Gloria’s arms and Gloria’s son from her first marriage, Manny. The boy lacks absolutely all form of self-conscious habits. Gloria rushes over while screaming, “Baby Hermana!” and grabs her in a massive bearhug, meaning she’s gotten over the fact Sonia tried to kiss her husband. Manny tells her, “Aunt Sonia, might I say that you look wonderful!” Sonia smiles, “Thank you, Manny.” He adds, “You’ll be more thankful after I’ve gotten you a ticket to an all-day spa resort.” Sonia hops for joy, while Jay asks Manny, “Did you take into account who would unpack for her?” Gloria smiles mischievously, “Why the machismos of course.” Jay mutters, “Fan-frickin-tastic.”
1121.title: Sex "Demon"

11211.content: The spa resort was the most relaxing day Sonia ever had. There were so many different things done that it made her feel like she was being shaped like clay. When she saw her sister again, Sonia asks, “What time is it? It feels like so little time has passed.” Gloria nods, “Aye.” A door opens and in walks an odd sight. A woman with dark eye shadows, black dyed hair, and a black dress enters, explaining, “It is now 8 in the afternoon. Now it’s time for the final treatment: Manicure, Pedicure, Facial Massage.” She takes Sonia by the hand and states, “My name is Victoria and I will be taking care of Miss Sonia. Mikayla will be taking care of you Miss Gloria.” A blonde bimbo takes Gloria’s hand and takes her down one hallway while the goth girl takes Sonia down another. Here, Victoria gives to Sonia a matching pair of bright red nails on her fingers and toes. Victoria bluntly asks, “So why do you hate your sister?” Sonia is surprised by this and asks, “Why do you say that?” Victoria explains, “It’s simple. I can tell things about people, especially sisters. And frankly your sister is very oblivious to the glares you give her.” Sonia vents, “The woman’s a punta! First, she uses my first ticket out of Columbia to come to America, then, she marries Jay, a man who said at their son’s christening that he originally wanted to ask ME out instead of the bruja, and to top it all off when I try to kiss Jay she finds out from that unholy baby monitor!” Victoria clarifies, “So you’re unhappy because she’s living the life you want? And also, you try to kiss her husband and she still takes you here?” Sonia clarifies, “Gloria’s son from her first marriage, Manny, got this for us.” Victoria looks away from Sonia, “I can help.”

113.content: How old is Haley when she gets pregnant?
113.title: Haley

11312.content:
Haley looked down at the two blue lines, and her heart sank.

The first thing she thought was how disappointed her mom would be of her, after telling her so many times to use a condom when she eventually started having sex. She'd lied to her time and time again, telling her that she and Dylan weren't ready, and that she didn't need to go on the pill just yet - promised to be safe and yet here she was in a drugstore bathroom with a pregnancy test between her fingers telling her that yes, she was indeed pregnant.

Dylan and Haley had only slept together a handful of times, stealing any steamy moment they could however awkward, usually doing it in the back of his car as both their houses were never truly empty. Haley had thought she was ready to lose her virginity since her friends were, but while they were losing it in motel rooms or their own bedrooms, she felt she'd missed out on that 'special' first time and if she was honest, she didn't think she actually loved Dylan.

Sure, he was hot, but they didn't really talk much when they hung out, they just made out and he listened to her while she complained about her parents and siblings.

It had been three weeks since she'd realized her period was late, but shook it off and tried to tell herself that it was nothing. Two weeks ago, she started feeling exhausted and nauseous, but this time she put it down to flu. A week ago, she'd started to eat a little more and felt bloated more often, and realized she'd now missed her period for two months and that her tummy was no longer flat, and that her breasts had started to feel sensitive.

At this point, Haley knew what was going on, and accepted that she needed to take a test. Tears now flowed down her face as she cycled through the three options she saw: abortion, giving up the child for adoption, or keeping it.

She knew in her heart she wouldn't be able to go through with an abortion, and could she really give up a baby after carrying it for seven more months? What made matters worse was that she and Dylan had broken up a few weeks ago, and from what she'd heard he was now dating a junior called Heather.

Just then, her stomach rumbled. For the last few days, Haley's appetite had been almost insatiable, which she put down to the pregnancy. Her hand rested on top of her small bump as she tried to think what to do next - she was thinking a buffet would be a great way to kill two birds with one stone as she could drown her sorrows for an hour or so while also satisfying her growing hunger.

She left the stall, trying to keep her head high as she went to her car and started driving to Mama's Grub Buffet.

*****

Two hours later, Haley lent back in the dark booth at the back of the buffet restaurant after eating almost three full plates of mac n cheese, sliders, buttered greens, and loaded fries and nachos before finishing it off with a large bowl of ice cream. While her hunger was satisfied (for now), her stomach had grown, highlighting her new situation clearly as she rubbed the softer skin. Even though she was young, Haley knew that if she kept eating like this she'd lose her enviable figure and vowed to not let herself eat like that ever again, although she knew in her heart of hearts her habits would slowly change and she wouldn't just be gaining baby weight.

That's when an idea popped into her head: she wasn't ready to tell her parents about the pregnancy just yet, so why not just wear baggier clothes and put it down to weight gain until she knew how to tell them.

Haley stared lovingly at her small belly, thinking of the baby inside her growing, about the life they could have together...

It was official - she was going to be a teen mom.
11312.title: 16 and pregnant

1511.content: How does she get pregnant?
1511.title: Penny

15112.content:
It was another normal night for Penny. The Cheesecake Factory waitress was working a late shift, and it was getting late. Penny made her way to her car to leave for her apartment. Before she could drive off, she was blinded by a bright light. The next thing she new, she was unconscious.

She awoke groggily in what appeared to be an operating room. She was surrounded by tall, lanky figures, whom she couldn't make out. "Are you sure she will be able to do it? How can we be sure that she will be able to carry them to term, and live to birth them?", one asked. Another responded, "We are not entirely sure, but she is our last hope, her body is perfect for breeding our future." "Then let it be done." Penny wanted to scream, but she knew that it was just a dream, so she didn't. A large machine was retracted from the ceiling, with a needle attached to it. The needle was injected into her lower abdomen, and she could see a green liquid come from the liquid. After all of the liquid was injected, the machine moved back into the ceiling. Everything went black again.

Penny woke up peacefully in her bedroom. She looked at her clock and saw that it was almost noon, and it was Saturday. "That was the weirdest dream last night, I gotta stop watching those Sci-Fi movies with the guys..." She wondered how she got home, but she figured that she was driving half asleep. She was still in her work clothes, so she decided to get changed. She put on her bra, and noticed that it was tighter than it usually was. She looked down at her belly, and couldn't see where the injection was placed, so she knew that it really was a dream. She put on a t-shirt and skinny jeans. Penny remembered that she didn't have work today, so she wanted to go to the mall.
15112.title: Alien

151121.content:
Penny left her apartment just as Leonard and Sheldon were arriving in their own apartment across the hall. Leonard saw her, and wanted to ask her something. "Hey Penny, are you going out?" "Yeah, I'm just going shopping at the mall for a couple of hours." "Oh, that's cool, that's cool. I was wondering, me and the guys are gonna watch a new Sci-Fi movie this afternoon at three, you wouldn't want to watch it with us, would you?" Almost immediately, Penny responded, "Absolutely!" Leonard and Sheldon were both amazed by this. "Really? Cool!" Sheldon added," Just remember Penny, if you are more than five minutes late to our viewing, you will receive your third and final strike, and you do not want to know what will happen if you get that strike!" "I'll keep it in mind..." Penny left the apartment after that. "Well that was surprising, she wasn't as happy yesterday..." Sheldon responded bluntly, "Mood swings are common when a female is PMS'ing.''

Arriving at the mall, Penny wanted to get some clothes. She went into Victoria's Secret to buy some lingerie. In the store, she bought a sports bra to wear at the gym, a regular bra, and a pair of panties. Making her purchases, she began to feel very hungry. She began to pat her belly in an attempt to calm it down, but it only seemed to make it worse. She completed her purchases, and made her way to the food court.

At the food court, her hunger was gnawing at her, as if she hadn't eaten in a week. She stopped at all of the restaurants in the food court, getting a little bit of everything. Quickly finding a seat, she began to shovel food down her throat like an animal. In mere minutes, she was finished. Penny began to pat her belly, thinking,"Is that enough food for you?" She looked down at her belly, and said,"Ugh, I have a bit of a food baby. Whatever, it'll go down in a little bit." She heard a loud "ping!", and saw that her jeans button had popped off, exposing her belly. Because of the bloat, her already small t-shirt became smaller, exposing even more of her belly. Embarrassed, she quickly left the mall.

Penny returned to the apartment at one in the afternoon, Penny hurried into her apartment, not wanting anyone to see her slightly puffy belly. Tired from her binge, she decided to take a nap.
151121.title: Continue

1511211.content:
Penny woke up a few hours later and noticed that it was only a few minutes to before Leonard and Sheldon's movie started. She sat up a was surprised at how heavy she felt, she was even more surprised to see that her food baby had not gone away, in fact it looked and felt bigger than before. She quickly put a woollen sweater on over her shirt and then exchanged some her jeans for some sweat pants. She looked at herself in the mirror, the bulky clothes whilst making her feel even heavier and sluggish did the trick of hiding her bloated belly. She made her way across to the other's apartment as quickly as she could, not surprised to see Sheldon counting down the last few minutes on his watch.

Penny didn't really pay too much attention to the movies of the guys, and today was no different except that whilst normally she didn't pay attention to the films because she could understand them (not doing the recommended background reading suggested by Sheldon in an email sent exact six hours before the movie started) this time she didn't pay attention because she was eating. She sat with a bowl of snack food on her lap noisily shovelling food into her mouth, after the third bowl Sheldon who had been shooting warning looks at her the entire time paused the movie and said, "could you be quiet some of us trying to watch the movie."
"Jus... turn ...he sub..itles on," said Penny with her mouth full.
"This is a vintage movie there isn't a subtitle option."
Penny swallowed and said, "just switch places with me and you can sit closes to the tv."
"And Leave My Spot!" said Sheldon articulating that this was not an option.
"Just turn the volume up," said Leonard.
"And go deaf!?" said Sheldon.
"What?" said Leonard as Penny poured herself her fifth drink of soda for the night.
"As mammals we don't regrow the hair cells in our ears, so too much noise breaks them impairing your ability to hear, Another thing that would be different if humans were descended from lizards is the would be no hearing loss." At that point Penny, who had just finished her drink, gave a loud belch, Sheldon clapped his hands over his ears.
Knowing that it was probably best if went (that and she finished all the snack food), Penny got up said goodbye and left. After she had Sheldon said, "good lord, the way she was eating you'd think she had been impregnated with the alien from this film."

When Penny got back to her apartment she decided to have a shower, whilst getting undressed she caught a glimpse of herself in the mirror, without the bulky sweater and sweat pants on she could see that her belly had gotten bigger, Penny was no expert on pregnancy (other than how not to become pregnant) but her belly definitely had that early expectant mother look to it, even her bra felt tighter. She finished getting undressed and hopped in the shower. Whilst washing herself she found her hand kept being drawn to her belly, whilst it was true that there was more belly then before, but unless she thought about her hands always start rubbing her belly. It was interesting she was half interest and half disgusted by it but as she rubbed she extremely calm and contented. As she was getting out of the shower (careful not to slip over as she had not bought some whimsical adhesive ducks) her belly gave a groan and she felt another pang of hunger, "You can't be hungry again," she said.

Penny decided to...
1511211.title: Continue

choices: She decides to hit the gym...
15112112.content:
Her belly groaned again, demanding more food. Penny rubbed her swollen belly, trying to soothe it.
"I'll get something to eat after I get dressed."
Her belly's groaning subsided, but a low gurgling still emanated from within. Still naked, she walked into her bedroom to get dressed. She put on a bra that she bought yesterday, which she was already outgrowing, and a pair of yoga pants, meaning that her bare belly was exposed. She made her way to the kitchen, and opened her fridge. She saw a half-full large bottle of soda, pulled it out of the fridge, and put it on the counter. Penny also found a carton of ice cream, and grabbed that.

Penny began to chug the soda quickly, and in a few minutes, it was empty. She grabbed a spoon and opened the ice cream carton, she opened the fridge again and got whipped cream and chocolate syrup for the ice cream. Penny covered the ice cream in the chocolate syrup, and began to intake spoonfuls of it, taking every few seconds to spray whipped cream in her mouth. She could feel the food make its way into her swollen belly, which made her appear three months pregnant. Her door burst open, and she heard someone say,"Hey bestie!" It was Amy Farrah Fowler, Sheldon's equally smart "girlfriend". She quickly made her way to the binging Penny, who was trying to cover up her belly with her hands, which did would not work.
"Are you alright, Penny?", she asked.

'I...yeah, I guess I just haven't gotten over breaking up with Leonard..."Penny lied, taking another bite of ice cream.

"That was over a year ago..."

"Yeah, but sometimes I think about it, and it makes me sad."

This made Amy feel bad for her, so she went over to Penny and hugged her. She had her hands in between Penny's boobs and her stomach, and her hands began to make their way upwards to her boobs. Penny grabbed Amy's hands and pushed them down, adding,"No thanks." "Sorry, but I'm just so jealous of your perfect figure and gorgeous blonde hair." Amy got a glance at Penny's belly, and saw that it was swollen. "I think I might take back that perfect figure statement." Penny put a hand on her belly, and said, "Oh, this? It's nothing, this is what happens when you eat as much ice cream as I have today...", she said, taking eating another scoop of it.

Amy said,"Alright, then. I can see that you want to be left in peace, so I'll see you soon." Penny got up and responded,"Bye, Amy," slowly pushing her towards the door as she did so. Penny slammed the door behind Amy.

"Thank God..."

Penny rubbed her belly, saying,"Was that enough? God, I think I might burst..." Examining her belly, she knew that she had to work it off, but she knew she could always do that in the morning. It was late, so she decided to go to sleep, hoping that she wouldn't have to go to the gym, because she had to work an all-day shift tomorrow.

In the morning....

151121122.content:
Penny was too tired to go to the gym, beside if she started trying to work out at the gym after so much food she probably throw up, she already felt vaguely nauseous as it was. She lumbered to her room lied down and fell asleep without bothering to get changed or get under the covers.

When she woke up the next morning she was disappointed to see that her belly was not only still there but slightly bigger than before, furthermore her breast had grown as her bra broke undone. Not wanting everyone to see her belly she put on a large brown coat and just left the apartment just as Leonard and Sheldon were leaving theirs.
